item.title: Enhance Your PowerShell Development with Visual Studio Code
item.description: Visual Studio Code (VS Code) has become a popular integrated development environment (IDE) for PowerShell developers, offering a rich set of features and capabilities that streamline the PowerShell development process. The PowerShell extension for VS Code, maintained by the PowerShell team and the community, provides an exceptional experience for writing, debugging, and managing PowerShell scripts. Powerful Features for PowerShell Developers The PowerShell extension for VS Code delivers a wide range of features that enhance the PowerShell development experience:
